text:
Hey Everyone!
My team and I are looking for ways to improve our experience with open source software support while benefiting their developers.
If you actively rely on open source, we would really appreciate your input on this short survey, on your usage of open source software and how you find support for it. Thank you!
<https://forms.gle/Un7MbXdjqxY5L9gB7>
Could you reproduce the error? Will there be a bugfix?
